title: Smoky tomato sauce for pasta
description: Roasting the tomatoes first gives this quick tomato sauce a smoky edge. Stir through pasta with a handful of olives.This meal, if served as three portions, provides 164kcal, 3g protein, 16g carbohydrate (of which 16g sugars), 9g fat (of which 1.5g saturates), 5g fibre and 0.2g salt per portion.
ingredients: a good glug fruity olive oil
salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 small handful fresh thyme sprigs, leaves only
1 handful fresh basil leaves, roughly torn
splash of red wine vinegar, or pinch of sugar, to taste
